Otto Frederick Rohwedder invented the first bread-slicing machine in 1928.

* [Sliced bread](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sliced_bread) is very convenient.
* Often described as "the greatest forward step in the baking industry since bread was wrapped."
* He was from Iowa.
